design concepts

home page
concepts.

Five creative directions for the Faith Point home page. Each explores a different aesthetic while keeping the same brand identity and content.

growth.
view design

growth.

Clean white canvas. Oversized lowercase type, rounded photos, maximum breathing room.

Light / Editorial
midnight.
view design

midnight.

Full-bleed dark with bold proclamation text. Dramatic, cinematic, statement-driven.

Dark / Statement
editorial.
view design

editorial.

Dictionary-style definitions, image-through-text, typographic experimentation.

Dark / Typographic
community.
view design

community.

Photo-forward with people grid, event-poster aesthetic, warm and personal.

Light / Photo-centric
hartbeat.
view design

hartbeat.

Bold, fun, and creative. Scrolling marquees, full-screen statements, immersive image mosaics. Inspired by hartbeat.com.

Dark / Bold & Creative
